title: 游戏开不了。。MISSING TEXTURE。。
author: 俺来看看
txt_content:
我昨天还能玩的，今天一开就出  Mmissing texture.



      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game

A full error report has been saved to C:\Documents and Settings\Z\桌面\Minecraft\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-08-09_13.22.07-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(



--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT c4a33a51 --------
Full report at:
C:\Documents and Settings\Z\桌面\Minecraft\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-08-09_13.22.07-client.txt
Please show that file to Mojang, NOT just this screen!

Generated 13-8-9 下午1:22

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.4.7
        Operating System: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
        Java Version: 1.7.0_25, Oracle Corporation

        OpenGL: Radeon X300/X550/X1050 Series GL version 2.1.8543 Release, ATI Technologies Inc.
        Is Modded: Probably not. Jar signature remains and client brand is untouched.
        Type: Client (map_client.txt)
        Texture Pack: 低像素材质.zip
        Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
        Vec3 Pool Size: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: null

java.lang.RuntimeException: javax.imageio.IIOException: Can't create cache file!

Caused by: javax.imageio.IIOException: Can't create cache file!

        at javax.imageio.ImageIO.read(Unknown Source)

        ... 4 more
Caused by: java.nio.file.NoSuchFileException: W:\userTemp\imageio1331876797683402875.tmp

求 各位帮帮忙！

replies.author: fzh5837302
replies.txt_content: = =你游戏崩溃了，应该是机子问题，试着调试下内存

replies.author: 俺来看看
replies.txt_content:
fzh5837302 发表于 2013-8-9 22:32 
= =你游戏崩溃了，应该是机子问题，试着调试下内存
我内存调1024，平时也是，就今天不知道怎么回事。一开就那样。游戏我也重装了，可是都没用。
